metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11752 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The ReadMAGICKImage function in coders/magick.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory leak) via a crafted file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0129-CVE-2017-11752.patch in unstable 0260-CVE-2017-11752-Fix-denial-of-service-memory-leak-in-ReadMAGICKImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
